name: database
description: Gradido Database Tool to execute database migrations
author: Gradido Academy - https://www.gradido.net

scripts.test: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development DB_DATABASE=gradido_test vitest --reporter verbose --no-file-parallelism run
scripts.test:debug: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development DB_DATABASE=gradido_test node --inspect-brk node_modules/.bin/jest --bail --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles
scripts.up:test: cross-env TZ=UTC DB_DATABASE=gradido_test tsx migration/index.ts up
scripts.up:backend_test: cross-env TZ=UTC DB_DATABASE=gradido_test_backend tsx migration/index.ts up
scripts.up:federation_test: cross-env TZ=UTC DB_DATABASE=gradido_test_federation tsx migration/index.ts up
scripts.up:dht_test: cross-env TZ=UTC DB_DATABASE=gradido_test_dht tsx migration/index.ts up
